on_boarding_1: Use the available coupons and save cash
on_boarding_2: Earn points from your each actions here
new_cross: Activation of the new cross offer
how_get_bonuses_answer:
AIn the All in Loyalty loyalty system you get points for each action you take. 
 Sign up the site - 500 points 
 Email confirmation - 500 points 
 Sign up the app - 50 points / every day 
 Invite a friend - 50 points 
 50 invited friend - 500 points 
 Suggest new company - 50 points 
 Share coupon - 50 points 
 Use coupon - 100 points 
 Book coupon - 50 points 
 Add new card - 50 points 
 Use card - 50 points / every time
how_use_bonuses: How to use the bonus points?
how_use_bonuses_answer: You can use your All in Loyalty loyalty system points from the moment when their number exceeds 5000 points. With the points you have accumulated, you can buy products from our partner wantit.am online store, paying up to 100% of their value.

delete_card_message_text: By deleting the card you can lose all the points on the card at the moment. Delete the card?
